rules.title: Hostel Rules & Guidelines
rules.subtitle: Simple rules and guidelines to ensure a harmonious living environment and optimal learning conditions for all students.
rulesList: Students must follow daily routine and timings strictly
Maintain cleanliness in dormitories and common areas
Respect fellow students and hostel staff
No mobile phone usage during study hours
Take permission before leaving hostel premises
Actively participate in hostel activities and programs
Report any health issues immediately to wardens
Maintain discipline and code of conduct at all times

virtualTour.subtitle: Take a virtual tour of our hostel facilities and get a feel of the living environment
virtualTour.description: Experience the hostel facilities through our interactive virtual tour

features: Separate rooms for boys and girls

admissions.heroSubtitle: Join our prestigious institution and embark on a journey of excellence in education and holistic development
admissions.admissionProcessSubtitle: Step-by-step guide to secure your admission at JNV Latur
admissions.documentsDescription: Please ensure all documents are in original and carry one set of photocopies for verification.
admissions.documentsNote: Note: All documents must be attested by a gazetted officer. Incomplete or non-attested documents will lead to rejection of application.
admissions.contactDescription: Contact our admission office for any queries or assistance.
admissions.tuitionNote: *Tuition fee is completely free for students from families with annual income below ₹2,50,000

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to commonly asked questions about admissions

questions.question: What is the selection criteria for JNV admission?
questions.answer: Selection is based on the Jankalyan Nivasi Vidyalay Selection Test (JNVST) performance, followed by document verification and medical examination.

questions.question: What is the medium of instruction?
questions.answer: The school follows a trilingual approach with English as the primary medium, and Hindi and Marathi as second and third languages respectively.

questions.question: Are hostel facilities mandatory?
questions.answer: Yes, JNV is a residential school and all students are required to stay in the hostel as part of the holistic educational experience.

onlineRegistration.title: Online Registration
onlineRegistration.description: Complete the online application form at the official JNV portal. Registration opens on January 15, 2024.

entranceTest.title: Entrance Test
entranceTest.description: Jankalyan Nivasi Vidyalay Selection Test (JNVST) for Class V admission. Test date: April 20, 2024.

meritList.title: Merit List
meritList.description: Merit list will be published based on test performance. Results announced by May 30, 2024.

documentVerification.title: Document Verification
documentVerification.description: Selected candidates must complete document verification and fee payment by June 15, 2024.

annualDayPreparation.title: Annual Day Preparation

codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.description: Students must maintain respectful behavior towards teachers, staff, and fellow students at all times.
details: Respectful communication with all members of the school community
No use of abusive language or inappropriate behavior
Proper etiquette during meals, study hours, and recreational activities
Maintaining dignity of the institution in all interactions

attendanceRequirements.title: Attendance Requirements
attendanceRequirements.description: Regular attendance is mandatory for all academic and co-curricular activities.
details: Minimum 75% attendance required for internal assessment
Medical certificates required for extended absences
Prior permission needed for planned leave
Punctuality expected for all classes and activities

uniformAndGrooming.title: Uniform and Grooming
uniformAndGrooming.description: Proper uniform and grooming standards must be maintained as per school guidelines.
details: Complete school uniform to be worn during school hours
Neat and clean appearance with proper grooming
No unauthorized accessories or modifications to uniform
Specific dress code for different activities and events

academicIntegrity.title: Academic Integrity
academicIntegrity.description: Students must maintain honesty and integrity in all academic work and examinations.
details: No cheating, plagiarism, or academic dishonesty
Original work submission for all assignments
Proper citation and acknowledgment of sources
Fair play in competitions and assessments
